name: Boost: Escape From Planet X
description:
Description

Take control of a rocket and attempt to escape the catacombs of Planet X and get back to Earth. There are 13 levels of danger.

Any feedback on my game will be very much appreciated!

Controls:

Space = Engines
A = Rotate Left
D = Rotate Right

Did you manage to complete the game?
Which levels were too difficult?
What was your favourite level?
